root: ^You've been summoned back to Dispatch for another performance review. Announcements have been made across the solar system, evacuation orders, readings concerning the Midas Corruption, calls for foreign aid.
^Things have been stirred to a panic, and for good reason. Kellis is reeling you back to HQ likely to address this, and you hope, give you guidance on how to proceed with your mission.

^Lanri has said that there's no telling how much of the golden wreckage is left slingshoting through planetary orbits, and predicting entry points will be next to impossible. Your time to finish Kellis' final test is closing, but the first matter is returning to Dispatch.
